name: Planning For Burial - Leaving [MRL25] 2xCS
description: THIS IS A PREORDER We expect to have these shipped by the 2nd week in December. been some delays in production so this is looking more like the end of the third week. sorry Long out of print debut album finally reissued this time on cassette with the full length version of the title track included on side C as well as the Untitled EP (also long out of print) and other outtakes from the era on side D. Set Includes: - Hand painted 5" reel to reel box (each one is unique) - 2 cassettes; 1 pink c50, 1 white c60 - 1" button set - 6 page booklet - Digital Download code - more? Limited to 125 hand numbered copies.

name: Planning For Burial / Lonesummer - Second Split [MRL24] CS
description: SHIPPING NOW only a handful of the mail order copies available Contains the first "heavier" material from Planning For Burial in over two years and the first new material from Lonesummer in over a year and half. Limited to 100 hand-numbered copies. Clear cassettes with pro-printed inserts (digital download code inside). Digital Version / Stream Here

name: Sujo + Sun Hammer - Fistula CS [MRL23]
description: Originally released on CD via Inam Records, we are proud to present the limited cassette treatment of Sujo + Sun Hammer's "Fistula". What other ears are saying: “Fistula takes on the minimal and the harsh, devastating abrasion and delicate clicks, working in both of Sujo’s & Sun Hammer’s own styles. This is a massive album, huge walls of speaker shredding noise that soothe the inner beast, blissed out darkness, a desolate, frozen tundra that hasn’t seen snowfall in months, white noise that turns in on itself, unnerving high end with bleak industrial feedback, hints of Sujo’s metalgaze balanced out with Sun Hammer’s bleak subtleties, these guys work incredibly well together, pushing for sounds neither have done on their own, coming up with something that’s a shining star in both of their catalogues.” - Anti-Gravity Bunny “On the surface, this is static, both literal and figurative; at its core there is a slow dynamic at work. The disc builds to a frenzied tangle of sound, then works its way back out–but never entirely. The title track is a great example–the sudden release from the sound-beating you’re taking comes with the growing understanding that it’s about to start again. Is it enjoyable? Hell, no. And it’s not supposed to be. It’s a matter of gritting your teeth and enduring.” - Hypnagogue “With the name as an obvious initial example, 'Fistula' propels the listener back into that early era of noise music as a deliberate disturbance to one's immediate listening environment and a vehicle for appreciating all sounds, be they environmental or (more often than not) starkly mechanical in nature. The sounds present on 'Fistula' serve only to invite equal measures of environmental appreciation and outright dread, with the release as a whole being perfectly suited to a solo venture through a Chernobyl warehouse; attempting (and sometimes failing) to stifle rising nerves.” – futuresequence “Fistula isn’t noise for noise’s sake; it’s savagery on a leash. The key to the album’s allure is the balance between the virus and the antidote, the distortion and the tune.” – A Closer Listen Tracklist: 1. OSD (3:44) 2. Safian (6:39) 3. Nataf (5:23) 4. Fistula (6:01) 5. Hari (5:05) 6. Qila (4:51) 7. Wolfshead (8:19) Preview album here! Collaborative recording between Indiana’s Sujo and Oregon’s Sun Hammer. white cassette release limited to 50 hand-numbered copies, with artwork featuring photography by Peter Nejedly. We ship everything First Class. Once we send it out it should take an estimated: 1 - 5 days in the USA depending on your proximity to NJ. 1 - 2 weeks depending on where you are in Canada. 2 - 3 weeks depending on where you live in the rest of the world.

name: So Stressed - Attracted To Open Mouths CD [MRL22]
description: Soured feelings spilling forth from Sacramento. A punch-drunk tone poem to Oral Fixation. Saddle Creek through a scuzz-filmed lens? The Next Big Loose Tooth. Tracklist: 1. Adults 00:46 2. A Fisherman's Feast 04:10 3. Little TV 01:22 4. Secret Breasts 03:10 5. Animals Seeking Political Asylum 02:18 6. Hairstyles 04:45 7. Molly 00:56 8. The Astronomical Horse 05:29 *9. Be Nice 13:28 *Previously unreleased bonus track exclusive to the MRL CD version Comes in jewel case with 4-page insert. Limited to an unrevealed amount of hand-numbered copies. Preview album here! We ship everything First Class. Once we send it out it should take an estimated: 1 - 5 days in the USA depending on your proximity to NJ. 1 - 2 weeks depending on where you are in Canada. 2 - 3 weeks depending on where you live in the rest of the world.

name: Life In The Dark - Hushed Bloom CD [MRL17]
description: Originally released by Sunyata Recordings earlier this summer, one fact rang out: Life In The Dark's music is simply too great to limit to small-batch cassette runs. The man behind both, Zen Zsigo, was kind enough to allow us to reissue "Hushed Bloom" on CD, and even provided us with an exclusive track. "To say it blatantly, Hushed Bloom, Life in the Dark's most recent output, is about death. Not some violent, explosive death, but something more quiet and passing, like a candle that slowly, but surely, burns out. These two lengthy tracks (each crossing the 15-minute mark), titled "Hushed Bloom" and "Comadeth," feature a much more low-key, highly minimalist side of Life in the Dark that, while hinted at in the past, has fully realized itself on this release. Solely featuring lush, distorted synthesizers, maybe reminiscent of Scott Cortez's guitar work with Lovesliescrushing, a drum machine, and Zsigo's own voice, Hushed Bloom is an adventure into the disembodied feeling of dying, like, as stated in the title of the second track, one might feel when in a coma. It is warm, there is no pain, only the distant feeling of leaving." - The Inarguable Tracklist: 1. Hushed Bloom (15:15) 2. Silent Stream (11:10)* 3. Comadeth (15:04) Limited to 100 copies, hand-numbered as usual. Comes in jewel case with 4-page insert, featuring cover art by Niels Geybels of Sequences. We Ship everything First Class. Once we send it out it should take: 1 - 5 days in the USA depending on your proximity to NJ. 1 - 2 weeks depending on where you are in Canada 2 - 3 weeks depending on where you live in the rest of the world.

name: BAD LIFE - THE DAY YOU DIE CD [MRL11]
description: It is best taken at maximum possible volume. Various journeys into the minds of the dying and the dead alive. From Music Ruins Lives: Every day blurs the same. The lines under your eyes are a map of your mistakes. The day you die, nothing changes. Bad Life is a procession of every half-heard sound that ever seeped through heat-cracked walls distorted. The Day You Die is eleven death rattles as rallying cries, grinding against the walls of this world. From LURKER: “There’s an enjoyable pop immediacy that is absent from a lot of the music we feature here, but the shimmering facade is soon shattered by a crushing doom riff ...[f]rom this point on it’s clear Bad Life aren’t just a walk in the park post-punk revival.” Limited to 100 Copies, hand-numbered as usual. Track List: 1. GOWN OF FLOWERS 2. RETURN TO THE EARTH 3. THE DOORS OF PERCEPTION 4. MORNING 5. THANK GOD 6. THE COMING FLOOD 7. UNDEAD '89 8. TWILIGHT 9. DEATH CONVERSATIONS 10. REIGN 11. IRON VOID STREAM THE ALBUM HERE SHIPPING NOW!!! We ship everything First Class. Once we send it out it should take: 1 - 5 days in the USA depending on your proximity to NJ. 1 - 2 weeks depending on where you live in Canada. 2 - 3 weeks depending on where you live in the rest of the world.

Limited to 100 copies hand numbered as usual Track List: 1. Sequences - Graminaea 17:08 2. Isolated Existence - Poaceae 19:48 3. name: Tom Vourtsis - Mothhunting CD [MRL07]
description: Focused as much on process as the finished product, Mothhunting mimics the 24 hour heartbeat of a deteriorating city from dawn to dawn. Throughout the album samples of guitar and field recordings are fed through an array of both analog and digital manipulators to create a balance between the two styles. 5 tracks approx. 36 minutes. RIYL: Eluvium, Tim Hecker, Mountains. Limited to 100 copies, hand-numbered as usual. Track List: 1. Ghost Doze 2. Overlookers 3. Mothhunting 4. Crowhurst 5. Attic Summers Stream The Album Ready to be shipped now! (unless you order it with a preorder) We ship everything First Class. Once we send it out it should take: 1 - 5 days in the USA depending on your proximity to NJ. 1 - 2 weeks depending on where you are in Canada. 2 - 3 weeks depending on where you live in the rest of the world.
